trans-unit.source: Use `dotnet workload search` to find additional workloads to install.
trans-unit.target: 'dotnet 워크로드 검색'을 사용하여 설치할 추가 워크로드를 찾습니다.

trans-unit.source: Updates are available for the following workload(s): {0}. Run `dotnet workload update` to get the latest.
trans-unit.target: Updates are available for the following workload(s): {0}. Run `dotnet workload update` to get the latest.
